formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: In the alternat block of the first function in Increment 5, Test 16, the return value is set to @LCO when it should be set to V18 instead.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: In the GenFnBlock we used the last element in the environment as the value to return, but this isn't correct. Instead, we need to explicitly lookup in the environment the last bound name.
